trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Richmond
There was one other sighting in Richmond on or around July 27th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside on my front porch with my camcorder, cause my dogs where takeing a fit, so i went out there to see what they were barking at. about that time the phone rang an it was my niece, an just so happened we were talking about ufos, when right out of the Blue, this low firey looking egg shaped object came over the field west of me,heading North East it was moving real slow..an lights were flashing from it..i grabed my camcorder an filmed it while i was telling my niece what I was seeing on speakerphone.it did not make any noise at all..an it was close enough to hear, but couldnt hear nothing..thenit looked like it was changeing shape or something, then it went behind the trees an i couldnt see it no more.the pictures iam sending u are actual photos of what I filmed
Summary: Dogs were barking an acting up, an I had a strange feeling, went on front porch, saw a egg shaped object, moveing quietly an slowly above Interstate signs .
